this is a great game, and i‚Äôve been playing it for over a year now. i‚Äôve completed every single game in the series on veteran, and i‚Äôve sunk many hours into clearing everything. but there are a few features that just make sense. the encyclopedia is one of the best parts of these games, and it really helps with strategy and finding the combos that work best against enemies. otherwise, this is great, abd i‚Äôm looking forward to the next content drops

title.label: No adds, and I love it

content.label: All there games have had no commercials which thank god that this company just wants a good mobile game and I have been a fan since 2012. Love the franchise and I get they need to raise money but please don‚Äôt make as many towers that we need to purchase.
Okay first of all I bought all of the money spending Hero‚Äôs now I go back and look back there all gone I have to pay to get them back I want a restore purchases option or else.

Brilliant game, I have found only a few fun almost ftp tower defense games and this is one of them. While you can buy heroes and towers they are cheap and acutally worth it. Gameplay is excellent and charecter and storyline are fun.

title.label: I would like to give it more then 3 stars

content.label: I actually did give it 5 initially as I love KR its a fantastic series! The art and play of this one is just as wonderful as the others. However I had initially found this on steam for the PC for $19.99 with the ecstatic reviews exclaiming no in app purchases! I prefer however to play on my iPad so went over to the apple store to purchase. I learned quickly that the no in app purchases did not extend to here, but bought anyway figuring it wouldn‚Äôt be too big of a deal. However its almost twice as expensive to purchase everything on the iPad. I was expecting the price to be at the very least equivalent to the PC or at worst maybe an extra $5. But to unlock everything it costs $32 not including the initial $5 dollars. And while I love KR I cant justify paying almost $40 for a game that does not have a lot of playable content thus far.
Have all past titles, this is refreshing
Please add endless mode :/ it‚Äôs been years since y‚Äôall have something exciting
Love this game, but on reinstallation I lost all my in game purchases. If i can get help with retrieving them (nothing in game helped), I would give it five stars. Also worth getting on steam.
Really unfortunate to see all the stuff that‚Äôs paywalled, especially considering that the game isn‚Äôt free in the first place. Only 3 heroes available without buying them? Ridiculous.

title.label: Amazing game worth the money, also suggestions

content.label: I absolutely love the kingdom rush series and have played it multiple times, and this game was amazing, however I have a few suggestions. First, where are the save files? I had a file I worked on for months then came back to the game a bit later and wanted to restart. The only way you can do that in Vengeance is to reset all progress. Second, more free heroes? I loved the variety in heroes from Origins and I hoped for more free heroes. I also wish there could be special heroes you get for different accomplishments. Maybe a hero you get with all 3 stars and the 2 extra challenges on every level, or with gems. There have been times where I wanted a hero but I had no way to know if it was worth it. I didn‚Äôt want to end up buying it and finding out I don‚Äôt like it. Maybe you could use a paid hero for 300 gems every stage? Speaking of which, I feel a bit ripped off. I did pay 5$ for a mobile game, expecting no ads and no micro transactions. Sure, the ads aren‚Äôt forced, but you still have to watch them to get gems. There is also micro transactions for gems. I can see micro transactions in free games but paying 5$ I expected the game to not be pay to win (you can get special items in battle for gems). I can understand maybe like 5 paid heroes and towers but 10 paid heroes and only 3 free? The towers are very balanced with 11 free and 7 paid, but I think there should be more free heroes. Other than these flaws, the game is beautiful, strategic, balanced, and very fun. I probably seem harsh, but I want my favorite mobile game series to be the best it can be! Amazing work to the developers!

title.label: Fun, challenging and full of Easter eggs

content.label: I love this game. Chock full of fun pop culture references and funny extras

Well first of all I don‚Äôt exactly mind the fact that it feels like a cash grab since I beat the game without spending anything extra but a few things still bother me like the fact that there is no encyclopedia because of this I found the enemy‚Äôs and towers at times quite forgettable as in the other games I could always remember what exactly they could do (plus I liked the small jokes that were sometimes in there) and now onto the next thing, the towers I feel like they all just seem kind of bland I liked how powerful they could be but sometimes they just didn‚Äôt feel great playing with, and then that ends my review it‚Äôs still a great game and it‚Äôs worth the cash but that‚Äôs everything I have to say

I have all of the kingdom rush games and they are the best. You don‚Äôt need to buy the hero‚Äôs and the gameplay is so fun.I recommend this game 10/10. Also when you beat the campaign there is more bonus levels that are hard and take a while.

Quality has dipped with subsequent new installments and the difficulty is ramped artificially high. Cheap mid-stage surprises used in end game from last few entries are everywhere now. Economy is a lot tighter. Design panders to an increasingly niche audience.

title.label: pay to unlock tower is not good

content.label: Pay wall on new additional towers are really unnecessary.Just put op heroes behind pay wall is enough, and a bit disappointed on the basic contents

title.label: Amazing gaming company with a great game.

content.label: This is a great challenging game that has kept me busy and having fun a while. They lay close attention to every detail and the story is both fun and interesting. Great replayability value!! It‚Äôs been there for a while I wish they could build on it and give us the next iteration!
This isn‚Äôt really worth paying for since levels are very limited. You run out of levels and there isn‚Äôt enough to do after that, so save your dimes on this one. Was very disappointed. üôÅüôÅ
If you enjoy tower-defense games, you won‚Äôt be disappointed. I have to admit, I even dabbled in in-app purchases with this one.
Great game but you have to buy everything separately
Kingdom rush games are the best tower defense games bar none. I just hope they will keep making them.

I can‚Äôt play this game without my iPad rebooting. This happens every. Single. Time. Tell me, is it the game or is it my iPad pro? If it‚Äôs my iPad Pro then i would change my review. But as of right now, this is trash and i really wish i could get my money back. Total waste.

I LOVE this game. I have devoted a decent amount of time to it. I have enjoyed it thoroughly. **There is an annoying problem because of the placement of the the item buttons** I, like many players, use my thumbs to play this game while flipping the phone horizontally. While tapping over the screen during a level, it‚Äôs very easy to touch the buttons with the palm of your hand. If they were at the top near the settings/pause menu, there would not be a problem. I have lost Vez‚Äônan‚Äôs Wrath TWICE now ‚Äî due to this annoying placement. Please either reimburse me the 1998 gems it cost or place the buttons up by the settings/pause button.

If you haven‚Äôt played an Ironhide game yet, I feel bad for you. They produce some of the best tower defense games I have ever played. Well worth the purchase price to not have ads between levels like some other games. 5/5 üëç

title.label: Love the concept, wish it was harder

content.label:
I have been playing through these tower defense games from ironhide for some time. I have bought them all. 
This is a fun game, the best graphics they have developed, and the levels are intricate and detailed. I recommend it, but I think is better as the either the first game or the last game to play from the series. First game because it is easier, last game because it is their best looking work and most interesting game play. 
The following is more for the developers.
In summary, the positives:
The ability to change towers is pretty creative and fun. 
The graphics are smoother and more detailed than any of your other games, it is a good looking game. Almost every level has several easter eggs that are interesting to look for which is fun.  
The story, while not exactly captivating, it well flushed-out
And the negatives:
Easy, even on ‚Äúimpossible‚Äù, compared to previous games. Other games I had really struggled at certain points, not so with this. 
Everything is expensive. Additional towers, characters, for a game that is not a cheap game (almost cost as much as the game itself).  Gems can be earned that can be used for power ups, and those are pretty expensive, or rather slow to accumulate. 
No strategy guide and encyclopedia like in previous games. 
What I‚Äôd like more of:
More bosses, those are pretty fun. 
Reoccuring characters, towers, even if for money. 
Cut scenes.
More crazy set up on the challenge levels, like only being able to use soldiers on a map, or only two towers, or level specific towers.
What I‚Äôd like less of:
Tutorial, I‚Äôd like to skip it.
Slow ramp up, the ability to have upgradable towers for the initial levels would be better.

title.label: One of the best Tower Defense Games I‚Äôve played yet!!!

content.label: For $5 you get probably the best tower defense game you can find. As a fellow fan of the genre, it‚Äôs difficult to find that TD game that gets you hooked and playing for a while. Ever since I started playing it, I‚Äôve been ADDICTED. This definitely deserves the 5 stars and I hope they improve the game even more with new updates and maybe even come out with another TD game!
Not bad for a free game, you will most likely need to play though on lower difficulty settings first. This will increase your stats high enough to advance on normal or hard settings.

Love the levels, strategy and humor. This one ventures a little into hokey territory - it‚Äôs more Roger Rabbit than cool arcade game - but everything else is improved from the amazing original. Bravo!

The gameplay is phenomenal. It‚Äôs fun and there is a lot of time that can be spent in the game. The large drawback is that the game is $5 bucks and then most of the heroes and towers are locked behind even more purchases. Really a bit lame.

Having played every installment of Kingdom Rush, I think this one is overall best. The tower and world designs are awesome. It‚Äôs full of small details and Easter Eggs. The tower designs are excellent. I like the spooky Halloween themed ones so much, I try to use them all even on levels when there are better towers. The starter hero is weak, unlike the awesome starter elf you got in Origins.

It‚Äôs definitely cruddy that you‚Äôre presented early on with a limited-time decision to make 2 purchases that raise the price of the game +700%. I can‚Äôt recommend this game to friends because what if they don‚Äôt enjoy the heroes/towers like I do... at $35+ bucks it‚Äôs steep and you need to give new players time to fall in love with the game before you throw that decision at them. Otherwise it feels manipulative like the Chinese knock-offs of KR that litter the App Store.

Keep up the great work, and please don‚Äôt become another EA Games. I play this series to escape all the dollar signs and that shady casino feeling.
Great game! Not amazing! But it's pretty good! Love the creativeness.

There‚Äôs a huge empty space at the bottom of the map.. in the desert section and part of Vez‚Äônans territory.. are you working on more levels? I thought maybe I had to beat it all to unlock more, so I did... but it didn‚Äôt unlock anything else.. SAD!! I hope more levels are in the works! I really love this game.

title.label: This game is really good no cap cuhhhh

content.label: So this game is so fun crip
I liked the old design and art production. This is still fun good game play like the others. Just cannot get used to the design.

title.label: Has some weird bugs, Pay to win

content.label: I love the kingdom rush series but this game went a bit too far. There are some weird bugs where enemies can attack you while odd the map and you can‚Äôt do anything about it, it also seems like you can‚Äôt intercept enemies near the edge of a map. Additionally, paying 30+ dollars to have access to all heroes and towers is just too much.

Great gameplay, ruined by all kinds of in app purchases! This will probably be the last kingdom rush game I buy considering after I bought it, you still have way too much content locked behind pay walls.

Another long fan of the kingdom rush franchise who‚Äôs played almost every game while jumping between mobile and pc. After all this time what I have noticed is it‚Äôs becoming harder to follow the series and have genuine enjoyment while playing. Every game that comes out has less unlockable content and differs even less than its predecessor. So much of this game is also now hidden behind a pay wall. The hero system in this game involves 3 characters that can be gained through normal play, and like 12 that have to be bought. Some costing up to 7 DOLLARS. It‚Äôs sad to see such a legend go but theres nothing worth looking for in this old, burnt out series.
Best I have played.

This game is awesome you fight loads of different enemies and upgrades on towers look dope af but you can only get 3 hero‚Äôs unless you pay they give you a lot of towers which is nice but 3 hero‚Äôs is ridiculous and you already pay for the game so please give us more hero‚Äôs for free :)
Best game ever!!!
Oh to hav me the good days where when you bought an app you got all content. Great game otherwise.

title.label: A pay to win paid app, no thank you.

content.label: Micro transactions plus grind walls that are designed to get you to spend real $.  Plus it‚Äôs just a bad TD game.  Balloons gives you more towers plus more control.  Don‚Äôt waste your money get a better made game. Have to assume all the 5star reviews on this are fake.

title.label: Fun but wish less pay to win

content.label: Great fun but enjoy paying 30 to 50 more bucks for full towers and heroes. Sigh...
5 dollars to get it then big in-app purchases that are crucial to the gameplay. Don‚Äôt let them take your money.
I‚Äôm a huge fan of the iron hide series, more specifically, kingdom rush. It is by far one of my favorite mobile games. The detail and work they put into this game is incredible.
I bought margosa and jack o lantern and it didn‚Äôt give it to me what should I do. I‚Äôve bought all of your games and never had this problem.
I don‚Äôt usually write reviews, but man is the kingdom rush series amazing. The quality of this game is top notch and I highly recommend it. Totally worth the 5 dollars.
